message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand that $150 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from $135. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand that $125 is still a bit of a stretch for me. I'm willing to compromise further. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $122 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
